observation: LondonLink  This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customise your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Cookies Policy If you decline, your information won’t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked. Cookies settings Accept Decline About Learn Show submenu for Learn Help center Blog Business Contact Open main navigation Sign in Get started Trade Bitcoin, Ether Your Preferred Crypto Brokerage in the UK and Europe. Rated 4.7 on Trustpilot LondonLink is a Bitcoin and Cryptoasset brokerage based in Europe. We aim to make crypto trading as straightforward and familiar as trading traditional assets. 55,000+ trades Our team has completed over 55,000 trades with our clients Excellent Service We pride ourselves on our world-class service and are rated Excellent on Trustpilot Crypto OTC Trading Over-the-counter (OTC) services for individuals and institutions “I have never needed to go anywhere else for my crypto. I have been a customer of LondonLink for over 3 years...” David Johns “The staff at this company are always courteous & helpful. The best company I have used for trading.Highly recommended” Colin Loft “I have been using LondonLink for a while now for my crypto investments and have to say they are a pleasure to deal with. Always professional and polite and so easy to deal with... ” Thedonn Quick and reliable service I have been using for about 18 months. After initial signup, trades are completed within a couple of minutes. Fees are reasonable, and customer service has always been excellent. Alastair Watt Our product Why LondonLink? With 10 years of expertise in the Crypto OTC markets, LondonLink is your professional partner. Enjoy great pricing, outstanding customer service, high availability and rapid trades. Competitive Pricing Outstanding relationships with liquidity providers and market makers around the world ensure LondonLink can offer great pricing for all our customers. Fast and Reliable Experience a seamless sign up process in just a matter of minutes. Our streamlined registration process ensures a hassle-free start to your trading journey. Deep Expertise With over 50 years of combined experience, you should be confident in our comprehensive knowledge in the cryptocurrency space. High Availability Unlike traditional financial markets, Crypto never sleeps. Cryptocurrency markets can be very volatile and at LondonLink we understand this which is why we’re available 7 days a week. Registered in Gibraltar LondonLink is a Virtual Asset Arrangement Provider (VAAP) under POCA 2015 and registered in Gibraltar.  We are not authorised / registered with the FCA in the UK. GBP & EUR Banking We’ve partnered with leading payment service providers in the industry to provide instant and seamless GBP and EUR bank transfers with more to come. Telephone Brokering We provide the technology you need, with the personal service you want. We’re experienced in providing personal service to our clients so if you prefer speaking to humans rather than robots please give us a call. Expert Support Email, phone, WhatsApp or live chat. Get in touch with us via whichever method suits you. Want to discuss a trade ahead of time? Get an indicative price or anything else on the medium you prefer. High Value Trades We pride ourselves on our ability to handle high-value trades of any size. Whether you are looking to buy or sell Crypto, rest assured that LondonLink has the expertise and resources to handle any challenge you present to us. LondonLink for Business In the rapidly evolving world of cryptocurrency, LondonLink stands as a beacon for businesses seeking to harness the power of digital assets. Expertise at Scale With over 50,000 trades under our belt, we bring a wealth of experience to cater to the unique needs of businesses, both big and small. Business Accounts Get access to our exclusive business accounts, designed for faster transactions, higher limits, and dedicated support. Dedicated Support Our business clients get access to a dedicated account manager, ensuring personalised service and fast response times. Register my business Learn more Start investing with LondonLink Create account Approved by Archax on 06/10/2023 LondonLink (GI) Limited is a limited company registered in Gibraltar under number 743219 with its registered office at Suite 19, Block 6, Watergardens, Waterport Road, GX11 1AA Gibraltar © LondonLink (GI) Limited 2024 Privacy Policy Security Risk Warning Terms & Conditions Acceptable Use Policy Risk Disclaimer Cookie Policy GDPR FAQ Key Facts Newsletter Follow us on LinkedIn Follow us on Twitter

thought: The WHOIS information reveals that the domain's registrant details are redacted for privacy, which is not uncommon. However, this alone does not indicate a scam, as many legitimate businesses also use privacy services to protect their information. The domain has been registered since 2019 and appears to be in good standing. I will now check for reviews and mentions of the website to see if there are any reports of scams or fraudulent activity.

thought: The search results indicate that there are positive reviews about LondonLink on Trustpilot, and there does not seem to be any mention of it being a scam on the review platforms. However, the Scam Detector's algorithm gives the business a rank of 50.7/100, which suggests a moderate level of trust. To further validate the legitimacy and to check for any reported scams, I should search for any discussions or mentions on social media platforms.

There are no recent tweets mentioning "londonlink.io" as a scam. This could suggest that there is no significant negative sentiment on Twitter regarding the website. However, I should also check on Reddit to see if there are any discussions or reports of scams related to the website.

There are no recent Reddit posts mentioning "londonlink.io" as a scam, which suggests that there is no significant negative sentiment on Reddit regarding the website either. With the positive reviews and lack of scam accusations on social media, I now feel confident to make a decision on the legitimacy of the website. Based on the information gathered, while there is no direct evidence of a scam, the moderate trust score from Scam Detector warrants caution. However, the absence of any scam reports on social media and positive reviews suggests that the website does not fit the typical profile of a scam site. I now know the final answer. The website https://londonlink.io/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has positive reviews on Trustpilot no scam accusations on social media platforms like Twitter and Reddit and the domain has been registered since 2019 and appears to be in good standing. While the Scam Detector's trust score is moderate there is no direct evidence or user reports to suggest that the site is a scam. Therefore the website does not exhibit the typical characteristics of a scam site.
